short_summary: The Canadian government has a requirement for the provision of a Water Jet Cutting Table
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2022-10-03 by 2:00 PM EDT.
duration_in_months: The contract will be from 2022-11-29 to 2025-03-31, excluding weekends
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title: W6448-23C007 Water Jet Cutting Table

### Details of Government Tender Announcement

* Reference Number: WS3629777153-Doc3630393035
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS3629777153
* Publication Date: August 24, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 3, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EDT
* Amendment Date: September 14, 2022
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 29, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025
* Tender Status: Cancelled
* UNSPSC Codes: 73152101, 73152102, 78180000
* Description: 
	+ Manufacturing equipment maintenance services
	+ Manufacturing equipment repair services
	+ Transportation repair or maintenance services

### Procurement Parameters

* Procurement Category:
	+ Type: Request for Proposal
	+ Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria:
	+ Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Delivery Location

* Regions of Delivery:
	+ Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contact Information
